recipes.name: Mushroom and Ground Beef
instructions: Wash and dice the onions into small pieces
Add olive oil and cook the onion on medium-low heat. (if the ground beef is frozen cook it first on low)
Once the onions have softened, add the ground beef
While the ground beef is cooking, wash and chop the mushrooms into decent-sized cubes
Season with salt and lots of pepper
Once the ground beef is fully cooked, add the mushrooms
Put the lid on and cook it medium for 10 min
Serve with rice or bread and enjoy :)

recipes.name: Lemon Garlic Chicken in the oven
instructions: Wash and cut the potatoes into big cubes
Wash the chicken and place it in a Pyrex
Add the onions and potatoes to the Pyrex
